name: Life in the Pack DEMO
description: wolfieandcupspack.tumblr.com is what this is based off of mainly. A good chunk of characters in this are based off of characters that do not belong to me mainly. For example, wolf Cuphead belongs to Studio MDHR mainly, and the design he is based off it belongs to thebbros.tumblr.com. This is HEAVILY incomplete and only a minor demo.
